caption.p: ( a, b) The 37-year-old female patient was examined with positive SARS antibody and diagnosed with SARS. ( a) On the 11th day after onset, the right upper lung field was detected with large ill-defined patchy shadows. ( b) On day 14 after onset, the right middle and inferior lung field and left middle and inferior lung field were seen with large patchy strip blurry shadows. Compared with afore imaging, the foci demonstrated obvious progression
